desc: Top-quality hand-poured soy candles made in Nashville, TN. Clean burning 100% Soy Wax Flakes & Wooden Crackle Wick. Dye-Free. Phthalate-Free. Burn 100+ hours.

layout.text: Roxanna's Candles are hand-crafted with care and integrity. We create the highest-quality, cleanest-burning, and most fragrant scented soy candles on the market.
